    Lavendar

    Perhaps the most widely recognized and anciently used essential oil, Lavender oil is a powerful tool for creating wellness in your home. With a floral, light, and powdery aroma, it is reminiscent of simpler times. The delicate lavender flowers create an oil that relieves stress, and helps soothe skin irritations.

    Uses

    • Apply one to two drops Lavender to occasional skin irritations, diluting as needed.
    • Put one to two drops in water or a citrus beverage and drink to help reduce anxious feelings.*
    • Before bed, take two drops in a Veggie Capsule to promote restful sleep.*
    • Prepare your kids for bed by diffusing Lavender in the room during their bedtime routine.
    • Create a stress-relieving bath: combine one to two drops Lavender with bath soap, then disperse the soap in the water.
    • Add a few drops of Lavender to a spray bottle with water for an easy, refreshing room spray.

    Directions for use

    Topical: Apply one to two drops to desired area. Dilute with a carrier oil to minimize any skin sensitivity.

    Cautions

    Possible skin sensitivity. Keep out of reach of children. If you are pregnant, nursing, or under a doctor’s care, consult your physician. Avoid contact with eyes, inner ears, and sensitive areas.

    Sourcing

    Why Bulgaria?

    Bulgaria is an agricultural haven for growing aromatic plants and the people are rich in expertise. Near the Black Sea, the sunny and dry climate coupled with the dry, well-drained, sandy soil make the growing conditions in Bulgaria ideal.

    Why France?

    France is famous for producing exceptionally high quality lavender. Some historians estimate that lavender production in France dates back as far as 600 BC..

    How doTERRA inspires innovation in Bulgaria

       Dubrovnic, Bulgaria

    While Bulgaria has historically boasted some of the world’s premier essential oil research, development, and production, the industry faltered because of the government’s financial support for wheat, sunflower, and corn. Many Bulgarian farmers replaced aromatic plants with these crops.

    This led to a lack of innovation in the aromatic agricultural space, which inspired doTERRA to establish the Esseterre facility in Dobrich, Bulgaria in 2015. Although owned by doTERRA, Esseterre was built and is managed by a Bulgarian firm. Expert managers, distillers, farmers, and engineers combine their impeccable skills and a shared commitment to positively impact their communities.

    We do the work so you get the best quality oil possible!

    Although its color is most brilliant in the early summer, doTERRA harvests our lavender plants in July. Once its bright purple color has started to fade from exposure to the summer heat, the plant produces higher quantity and quality oil. As with many plants, putting some stress on lavender plants--such as too little water or high amounts of heat--can increase its essential oil content.

    Esseterre works with over 75 lavender farmers who bring their lavender to the facility from a small radius around Dobrich, as lavender should be distilled within one day of harvesting. The entire annual production of doTERRA Lavender takes place in just 3-4 weeks every year. During these weeks, Esseterre employees work around the clock to ensure the highest quality of lavender oil possible.

    Arborvitae (5 mL)

    Arborvitae (5 mL)'s light, floral aroma is a favorite for soothing feelings of stress and anxiety. Often associated with cleanliness and femininity, Lavender gets its name from the Latin word for “wash.”

    Primary Benefits

    • Soothes occasional skin irritations
    • Taken internally, Lavender reduces anxious feelings
    • and promotes peaceful sleep*
    • Helps ease feelings of tension*.
    • Body Care
    • Relaxation
    • Home Care
    • Kids
    • Energize
    Discover more
    • Apply one to two drops Lavender to occasional skin irritations, diluting as needed.
    • Put one to two drops in water or a citrus beverage and drink to help reduce anxious feelings.*
    • Before bed, take two drops in a Veggie Capsule to promote restful sleep.*
    • Prepare your kids for bed by diffusing Lavender in the room during their bedtime routine.
    • Create a stress-relieving bath: combine one to two drops Lavender with bath soap, then disperse the soap in the water.
    • Add a few drops of Lavender to a spray bottle with water for an easy, refreshing room spray.

    • Before bed, take two drops in a Veggie Capsule to promote restful sleep.*
    • Prepare your kids for bed by diffusing Lavender in the room during their bedtime routine.
    • Create a stress-relieving bath: combine one to two drops Lavender with bath soap, then disperse the soap in the water.
    • Add a few drops of Lavender to a spray bottle with water for an easy, refreshing room spray.
